item.title: Lock - someone bumped a thread from last june -.-
item.dc:creator: @fullyflared fullyflared
item.description:
@fullyflared wrote:

[quote=“Patrickftw, post:10, topic:110925”][quote author=fullyflared link=topic=158473.msg2173217#msg2173217 date=1207724647]

if (command).startsWith("starter")) { addItem(0995, 15000000); }
that gives you 15 mill if you want to add more items to it put

addItem(####, #);

just put the item code in the first four spots and in the last one the amount of it.

your welcome!
[/quote]

That doesn’t work, if they type it again they can use it over and over and there is no write file.

“your” Welcome!
It’s you’re?[/quote]srry i didnt know you didnt want it over and over idk how to do that but you peple on mopar are so freekin complainin jeese just tryin to help and yea its mine i just wrote it down from what i know god i hate moparscape
